name: Blood of the beast
description:
Transform to werewolf and tear your enemy apart

Controls:

human

- arrows to move

- down to roll 

- c to attack

-x to transform when wolf icon appears

Werewolf

- arrows to move

- x to attack

- enemy cant hurt you in this form.

- up to howl ( enemy will be scared)

GOAL: kill 32 + enemy to advance.

have fun ;)
